long_description: As a minimalist thermal baselayer, the Piton Fleece bottoms give stretchy stand-alone warmth on moderate days; layered beneath a shell, they give toasty insulation in full-on winter conditions. Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) fabric is super soft, highly breathable and moisture wicking; the smooth jersey face makes it easy to slide on an outer shell. Elasticized nylon waistband and cuffs seal out the weather. Pocket sewn into the inner front waistband has an elastic key cord. Tights-style fit.
